metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3573 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
In libsixel v1.8.2, there is an infinite loop in the functionsixel_decode_raw_impl() in the file fromsixel.c, as demonstrated bysixel2png.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsixel package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
